localizedItems.shortDescription: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's Mightiest Heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

localizedItems.name: Avengers: Age of Ultron

localizedItems.description: The local news by James Smith
localizedItems.name: Newscast

localizedItems.shortDescription: The impressive desert and mountainous areas of Iran and Uzbekistan are a traveler’s dream destination. Snowy mountains, incredible heights, salt deserts define this 3,000 km journey.
localizedItems.description: The impressive desert and mountainous areas of Iran and Uzbekistan are a traveller’s dream destination. In the desert city of Yazd we encounter places and traditions of the Persian Zoroastrian religion. In Kerman we get intimate impressions of a family’s preparations for the New Year’s celebration Nowruz. Then it’s on to bigger adventures: snowy mountains, incredible heights, salt deserts and finally the incredible desert scenery of Kalout. Our way is also paved by the fascinating and open people we meet: a camel breeder, women who share their stories of peasant life, a Sufi Master and herbalist who lets us in on the secrets of his trade and religious practice.
localizedItems.name: The Beauty and Mystery of the East - From Isfahan to Samarkand
